* [Municipal Court](https://www.myspi.org/department/index.php?structureid=30)

  The Municipal Court's primary function is to process all Class C Criminal charges filed by the Police Department and Code Enforcement Officers alleged to have occurred within the city limits of the City of South Padre Island. These include charges filed under the Texas Transportation Code, Penal Code, Alcoholic Beverage Code, Health and Safety Code, Education Code, and the City of South Padre Island Code of Ordinances.

[**SPI** Projects
================](https://www.myspi.org/topic/?topicid=31&structureid=18)


![](https://www.myspi.org/egov/images/1751487480_24782.png)

[#### South Padre Island Convention Center Expansion](https://ccexpansion.my.canva.site/convention-center-expansion-website)

##### 

Expanding the Convention Center is a priority as the Island is dependent upon tourism. Efforts to expand the existing Convention Center have been in the works for over 15 years.

[Click here](https://ccexpansion.my.canva.site/convention-center-expansion-website)to view the South Padre Island Convention Center Expansion Project

presentation that will be shown at the City Council Workshop on July 2nd

[Learn More](https://ccexpansion.my.canva.site/convention-center-expansion-website)
